definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Low-voltage dual frequency synthesizer for radio telephones.
sentences.chinese: 低電壓無線電話雙頻率合成器。

sentences.english: In this paper a new type of frequency-hopped frequency synthesiser is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種新式的跳頻頻率合成器。

sentences.english: When I have built up what I want to say, I can send it to a speech synthesizer.
sentences.chinese: 我編好要說的話，把它發送到聲音合成器。

sentences.english: Iris is an innovative sampling re-synthesizer that frees you to create sounds that could never before be produced.
sentences.chinese: 新穎的採樣合成器，它可以讓你將聲音變得可視化。

sentences.english: An independent frequency domain model and an independent time domain model are made for the Sigma-Delta fractional frequency synthesizer.
sentences.chinese: 文中分別爲合成器建立獨立的頻域和時域模型。

sentences.english: The synthesizer has a good performance thanks to harmonic phase locking technology and double feedback phase locking technology.
sentences.chinese: 該合成器採用諧波鎖相和雙反饋鎖相技術，性能優良。

sentences.english: I had a four-track and a synthesizer then.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個四軌錄音機和合成器。

sentences.english: The analog real-time synthesizer graphical design tool.
sentences.chinese: 模擬實時合成器圖形化設計工具。

sentences.english: And another has turned it into a synthesizer.
sentences.chinese: 還有人讓計算器變成了合成器。

sentences.english: Fixed a problem with Fuel Synthesizer and Burst Fire.
sentences.chinese: 修正了一個燃料合成器和爆裂火焰的錯誤。

sentences.english: The instrument can also double as an electronic control for a full - size music synthesizer .
sentences.chinese: 它可以兼作一個全套電子音樂合成器的電子控制部分。

sentences.english: Synthesizers are now very good at copying other musical instruments.
sentences.chinese: 現在的合成器可以模擬出很多其他的樂器。

sentences.english: Traditional mixers or synthesizer only provide feedback through the position of the controls.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的混頻器或合成器只提供通過控制位置反饋。

sentences.english: A fractional-N frequency synthesizer with novel dividers is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種採用新型分頻器的小數分頻頻率合成器。

sentences.english: He speaks with the help of a voice synthesiser.
sentences.chinese: 他也只能在語音合成器的幫助下才能講話。

definition: sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
